ValidationRule.description: OnlyAdmin can update a viewsonic employee mailing address
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(AccountId = '0011200001Dq2NA' || priorvalue(AccountId) = '0011200001Dq2NA')
&& $Profile.Name != 'SFDC Admin' && (ischanged(MailingStreet) || ischanged(MailingCity) || ischanged(MailingState) || ischanged(MailingPostalCode) || ischanged(AccountId) || ischanged(Email) || ischanged(AccountId))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only admin can change a Viewsonic Employee Addresss. If this is for an evaluation unit, please reload the page and put the special address in the special instructions. Thanks
